properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 c1 v3 c1 c1 c1 v4

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Jesus wants to keep us in His care
Ev'rywhere we go He's always there

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
He can give us joy beyond compare
Walking in the goodness of the Lord

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
If we follow Jesus He will lead
He will then supply our ev'ry need

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Absolute success is guaranteed
Walking in the goodness of the Lord

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Keep walking with the Lord all the way
Keep trusting in His Word ev'ryday

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: Keep looking for the Son, watch and pray

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
Keep walking, trusting all the way,
Looking, watching, praying ev'ryday

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Jesus is our Savior, God and King
We can look to Him for ev'rything

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
After all He's done let's shout and sing
Walking in the goodness of the Lord
